column1: # If line starts with a '#' it is considered a comment

column3: help message
SM clock frequency (in MHz).
Memory clock frequency (in MHz).
Current clock throttle reasons (bitmask of DCGM_CLOCKS_THROTTLE_REASON_*)
Maximum supported SM clock for the device.
Maximum supported Memory clock for the device.
GPU temperature (in C).
Memory temperature for the device.
Total energy consumption for the GPU in mJ since the driver was last reloaded.
Power draw (in W).
Current Power limit for the device.
Fan speed for the device in percent 0-100.

column1: # Utilization (the sample period varies depending on the product)

column3: GPU utilization (in %).
Memory utilization (in %).
Value of the last XID error encountered.
Throttling duration due to power constraints (in us).
Throttling duration due to thermal constraints (in us).
Throttling duration due to sync-boost constraints (in us).
Throttling duration due to board limit constraints (in us).
Throttling duration due to low utilization (in us).
Throttling duration due to reliability constraints (in us).
Frame buffer memory used (in MB).
Total Frame Buffer of the GPU in MB.
Percentage used of Frame Buffer: ‘Used/(Total - Reserved)’ (Range 0.0-1.0).
Performance state (P-State) 0-15 (0=highest).
Total number of single-bit volatile ECC errors.
Total number of double-bit volatile ECC errors.
Total number of single-bit persistent ECC errors.
Total number of double-bit persistent ECC errors.
Total number of retired pages due to single-bit errors.
Total number of retired pages due to double-bit errors.
Total number of pages pending retirement.
Total number of NVLink flow-control CRC errors.
Total number of NVLink data CRC errors.
Total number of NVLink retries.
Total number of NVLink recovery errors.
Total number of NVLink bandwidth counters for all lanes
vGPU License status
Number of remapped rows for uncorrectable errors
Number of remapped rows for correctable errors
Whether remapping of rows has failed

column1: # Profiling (not supported on RTX class GPU)

column3: These all start with DCGM_FI_PROF_* Ratio of time the graphics engine is active. The graphics engine is active if a graphics/compute context is bound and the graphics pipe or compute pipe is busy.
The ratio of cycles an SM has at least 1 warp assigned (computed from the number of cycles and elapsed cycles)
The ratio of number of warps resident on an SM.
The ratio of cycles the any tensor pipe is active (off the peak sustained elapsed cycles)
Ratio of cycles the fp64 pipe is active.
Ratio of cycles the fp32 pipe is active.
Ratio of cycles the fp16 pipe is active (This does not include HMMA).
The ratio of cycles the device memory interface is active sending or receiving data.
The number of bytes of active PCIe tx (transmit) data including both header and payload.
The number of bytes of active PCIe rx (read) data including both header and payload.
The total number of bytes of active NvLink tx (transmit) data including both header and payload.
The total number of bytes of active NvLink rx (read) data including both header and payload.

column1: # Static configuration information. These appear as labels on the other metrics

column3: Driver Version
NVML Version
Device Brand
Device Serial Number
OEM inforom version
ECC inforom version
Power management object inforom version
Inforom image version
VBIOS version of the device
